<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Palette of Masterstrokes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1759)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 84

**Price** 1,950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This painter's palette is decorated with an image of [Shelyn's](/Deities.aspx?ID=17) religious symbol: a songbird with a colorful curved tail. The feathers on this tail constantly produce a wide range of colorful pigments, granting you a +2 item bonus to [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks made to create paintings. A _palette of masterstrokes_ functions as a divine focus for a cleric of Shelyn.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute (envision, Interact);  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The _palette of masterstrokes_ casts [_creation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=54) as a 5th-level divine spell to your specifications.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** With a sweeping motion, you swing the _palette of masterstrokes_ in your hand. It casts [_color spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=44) as a 4th-level divine spell. The spell DC is 29.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
